title: President condemns killing of passengers in Noshki
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 13 (APP):Â President Asif Ali Zardari Saturday strongly condemned the merciless killing of passengers in Noshki. In a statement, he expressed grief and sorrow over the barbaric killing of passengers by the terrorists.
Those who targetted the innocent citizens could not be well wishers of the nation, he said adding the whole nation rejected the heinous designs of the terrorists.
The President said the security forces with the support of the nation were determined to completely eradicate terrorists.
He expressed sympathy with the heirs of those who lost their lives.
He prayed for the departed souls and for patience to the bereaved families.
